content: And then as we talked about specific to our business, we do see B2B is the fastest-growing part of the business and will help -- will become a bigger part of the mix in the second half of the year, and we have some exposure to the AP Media vertical and specifically the political media cycle, which will positively benefit us as well. As John mentioned, we have -- there's been some interesting data on personal loan originations, which are really strong recently, and that will lead to greater repayment volume in future periods as well.
